org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math

Class ApproximationMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.utils.math.ApproximationMath

  • public final class ApproximationMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Math functions with less accuracy but increased performance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      An exp approximation based on the article "A Fast, Compact Approximation of the Exponential Function", Nicol N.

    • Method Detail

      • gaussian

        public static double gaussian(double x,
                              double norm,
                              double mean,
                              double sigma)
        Gaussian function using exp(double)
        Parameters:
        x - x
        norm - the normalization factor
        mean - the mean
        sigma - the standard deviation
        Returns:
        norm * e ^ -((x - mean)^2 / 2 * sigma^2)

      • exp

        public static double exp(double x)
        An exp approximation based on the article "A Fast, Compact Approximation of the Exponential Function", Nicol N. Schraudolph, Neural Computation (1999) It has a max relative error of about 3e-2 for |value| < 700.0 or so, and no accuracy at all outside this range.
        Parameters:
        x - the exponent
        Returns:
        an approximated value for e^x

      • gaussianFunction

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction gaussianFunction(double norm,
                                                                                    double mean,
                                                                                    double sigma)
        Create a gaussian function.
        Parameters:
        norm - the normalization factor
        mean - the mean of the distribution
        sigma - the standard deviation of the distribution
        Returns:
        a new gaussian function object
